ch0175_00_gojika/0101_0701_01_10:
Welcome once again to the island where the
strong gather together,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0175_00_gojika/0101_0701_02_10:
Let us both go forth, treading the path revealed
by fate and the stars.
ch0175_00_gojika/7101_0701_01_10:
I, Olympia, am not just a Gym Leader. I tell
fortunes, too.
ch0175_00_gojika/7101_0701_02_10:
Place your hand inside my bracelet to hear where
the stars intend to lead you.
ch0175_00_gojika/7102_0701_01_10:
Here on this island, there are others, too, who can
see what lies ahead.
ch0175_00_gojika/7102_0701_02_10:
I believe their words—as well as mine—may help
you, if you hear them out.
ch0175_00_gojika/7103_0701_02_10: are rituals to decide your fate and future.
ch0175_00_gojika/7103_0701_03_10:
The bonds that you form with your Pokémon
friends will light up your future.
ch0175_00_gojika/7104_0701_02_10:
may reveal thoughts, stars, fate... All are dear
to me.
ch0175_00_gojika/7104_0701_03_10:
Battling with them, I, Gym Leader Olympia, feel
peace in my heart.
ch0175_00_gojika/7105_0701_01_10:
Not led by the stars, you are one who
leads the stars along your own
path, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0175_00_gojika/7105_0701_02_10:
You shine so bright, you may change others’
futures.
ch0175_00_gojika/1701_0701_01_10: Do please allow me, Gym Leader Olympia...
ch0175_00_gojika/1701_0702_01_10:
It may be of use in the future and show you
which path you should take.
ch0175_00_gojika/2501_0701_01_10:
I beheld your fate and saw you rise to glory on
this path you walk.
ch0175_00_gojika/2501_0701_02_10:
But do remember... On this journey you follow,
no end lies in sight.
ch0175_00_gojika/2501_0701_03_10:
You are sure to meet many different fates as you
walk along your path.
ch0175_00_gojika/2501_0701_04_10:
Yes, I see you walk across countless places and
live through varied times.
ch0175_00_gojika/2501_0702_01_10:
The past and future are not bound to just one
fate—this is “potential.”
ch0175_00_gojika/2501_0702_02_10:
I look forward to seeing how you grow from here.
I have quite high hopes.
ch0175_00_gojika/2511_0701_01_10:
When I tell fortunes, there is something even I
cannot see clearly.
ch0175_00_gojika/2511_0701_03_10:
Under no circumstances can it be contained.
Nature is a force that will do exactly as it pleases,
no more.
ch0175_00_gojika/2511_0702_01_10:
It is difficult to foretell the fate of those who hide
their true selves.
ch0175_00_gojika/2511_0702_02_10:
Knowing someone’s past—and their
aspirations, too—helps tell their fortune.
ch0175_00_gojika/3001_0701_01_10:
The glint of sunrise. As the world brightens, so too
does the future.
ch0175_00_gojika/3003_0701_01_10:
Though unseen by day, the stars guide us even
now to our destinies.
ch0175_00_gojika/3005_0701_01_10:
The tranquility of the stars will grant us strength
to face tomorrow.
